entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
